alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:56AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON, SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER, NORTHWESTERN CLERMONT AND SOUTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 530 AM EDT... At 456 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Ross, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Fairfield, Mason, Lebanon, Forest Park, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, North College Hill, Madeira, Wyoming, Milford, Mount Healthy, Deer Park and Finneytown. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 11 and 27. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 10 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
